question: Which of the following was the most effective contribution made by Dadabhai Nauroji to the cause of Indian National Movement?
option1: Brought the problems of Indians to the notice of the British.
option2: Exposed the economic exploitation of India by the British.
option3: Interpreted the ancient Indian texts and restored the self-confidence of Indians.
option4: Stressed the need for eradication of all the social evils before anything else.
answer: Exposed the economic exploitation of India by the British.
explanation: As an economic thinker, Dadabhai Naoroji contemplated and zeroed in on the conclusion that the reason behind the economic hardships of India was its systematic exploitation by the British colonial government. His famous \'Drain Theory\' explained how India\'s wealth was being drained to England through various means.
